suppress.notes: SnakeYaml's Constructor() class does not restrict types which can be instantiated during deserialization.
liquibase-core core needs major version latest 4.2.2. not resolving current CVE issue.
Jackson core needs major version latest 2.12.7 not resolving current CVE issue. Same applies to json-path version 2.4.0. Same applies to json-smart version 2.4.10
Jackson-databind version 2.12.7.1 in combination with postgres has interface changes in DBUtils that cause unit tests to fail.
Postgres version 42.4.3 in combination with jackson-databind has interface changes in DBUtils that cause unit tests to fail.
Various spring externals need upgrading past version 5.4.11 to resolve CVE issues.
poi, poi-ooxml, and poi-ooxml-schemas need upgrading past version 4.1.2 to resolve issue.
Jakarta.el version 4.0.2 causes issues in unit tests. Code changes required for version upgrade.
Upgrading tomcat causes unhealthy pipeline error.
